query:
ALTER TABLE task_rotation_occurrence_notes 
ADD COLUMN isSpecial BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER isSkipped,
ADD COLUMN specialName VARCHAR(255) AFTER isSpecial,
ADD COLUMN specialDate TIMESTAMP AFTER specialName;
